dict.acceptation: 说明；表明；给…加插图；（用示例、图画等）说明；

sent.orig: Can these similarity illustrate they have common ground?
sent.trans: 这些相似性是否能说明它们有共同点呢？

sent.orig: Procedure, three examples illustrate the evolution of genetic algorithms in the network output trends.
sent.trans: 程序分3个示例说明遗传算法进化过程中网络输出的变化趋势。

sent.orig: The streamers thus illustrate the ethical dualism taught by Zarathushtra.
sent.trans: 因此，这条横幅是阐明了琐罗亚斯德教导的与伦理有关的二元论。

sent.orig: The results also illustrate that Hg flux was significantly correlated with both radiation and soil temperature.
sent.trans: 土壤-大气界面间的汞交换通量与光照强度具有显著的相关关系，与土壤温度也有很好的相关性。

sent.orig: As an example to illustrate this article to pump the distributed system implementation process.
sent.trans: 本文以此为例来说明分布式变频泵系统的实现过程。
